column1: Operation Warp Speed is accelerating the development of a COVID-19 vaccine by producing doses of the vaccine simultaneously to the research. When a safe & effective vaccine is produced it will be available if you believe it’s the right choice for you and your family. https://t.co/oXVJNfbZGs

Vaccines hold the key to resuming our normal lives and the @realDonaldTrump Administration is leading the charge. Operation Warp Speed is on track to produce a vaccine for COVID-19 in record time. #GOPDoctorsCaucus https://t.co/8AKFnwv7WP

I’m proud to join @RepTedBudd and @RepHarley in introducing the bipartisan Drug-Free Communities Pandemic Relief Act. This important bill would ensure community-led drug treatment coalitions can remain operational during the #COVID19 pandemic.

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has been crucial in keeping small businesses afloat during the COVID-19 emergency. In order to provide more flexibility for these businesses to use these funds to recover I supported the Paycheck Protection Program Flexibility Act. https://t.co/5CnyA86WC9

During the @WaysandMeansGOP hearing on The Disproportionate Impact of COVID-19 on Communities of Color I also asked about additional socioeconomic factors – including income & broadband access – that can be compounding the underlying healthcare issues. https://t.co/i21LTYicOb

Great news from @Kia today as they’ve begun production of face shields at KMMG in West Point for medical personnel during the COVID-19 pandemic. The first donations will stay in Georgia and they’ll ship to other parts of the country in the coming weeks. https://t.co/2WHuH2OYND

The CARES Act provides unprecedented resources to our healthcare system during these extraordinary times. It will get more resources into the hands of our healthcare providers quickly expand access to care for #coronavirus patients and support our public health response. https://t.co/yEYZ1UKxEa
